sourcesContent: import { Component, ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { @ViewChild('canvas') canvas!: ElementRef; rectangleForm: FormGroup; horizontalLinesArray: number[]; verticalLinesArray: number[]; constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.rectangleForm = this.formBuilder.group({ width: null, height: null, horizontalLines: null, verticalLines: null, horizontalDistances: this.formBuilder.group({}), verticalDistances: this.formBuilder.group({}), }); this.horizontalLinesArray = []; this.verticalLinesArray = []; } ngOnInit(): void { this.rectangleForm.get('width')?.valueChanges.subscribe(() => { this.drawRectangle(); }); this.rectangleForm.get('height')?.valueChanges.subscribe(() => { this.drawRectangle(); }); this.rectangleForm.get('horizontalLines')?.valueChanges.subscribe((value) => { this.addHorizontalDistances(value); }); this.rectangleForm.get('verticalLines')?.valueChanges.subscribe((value) => { this.addVerticalDistances(value); }); } ngAfterViewInit(): void { const canvas = this.canvas.nativeElement; canvas.width = 800; canvas.height = 600; } onSubmit(): void { const horizontalDistances = this.rectangleForm.value.horizontalDistances; const verticalDistances = this.rectangleForm.value.verticalDistances; console.log('Horizontal Distances:', horizontalDistances); console.log('Vertical Distances:', verticalDistances); this.rectangleForm.reset(); } getLinesArray(lineCount: number): number[] { return Array(lineCount) .fill(0) .map((_, index) => index + 1); } addHorizontalDistances(count: number): void { const horizontalDistances = this.rectangleForm.get('horizontalDistances') as FormGroup; horizontalDistances.reset(); for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) { horizontalDistances.addControl(`distance_${i}`, this.formBuilder.control(null)); } this.horizontalLinesArray = this.getLinesArray(count); } addVerticalDistances(count: number): void { const verticalDistances = this.rectangleForm.get('verticalDistances') as FormGroup; verticalDistances.reset(); for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) { verticalDistances.addControl(`distance_${i}`, this.formBuilder.control(null)); } this.verticalLinesArray = this.getLinesArray(count); } drawRectangle(): void { const width = this.rectangleForm.value.width; const height = this.rectangleForm.value.height; const horizontalDistances = this.rectangleForm.value.horizontalDistances; const verticalDistances = this.rectangleForm.value.verticalDistances; if (!width || !height) return; const canvas = this.canvas.nativeElement; const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); if (!ctx) return; ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); const offsetX = (canvas.width - width) / 2; const offsetY = (canvas.height - height) / 2; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.rect(10 + offsetX, 10 + offsetY, width, height); ctx.stroke(); ctx.font = '16px sans-serif'; ctx.fillText(`Width: ${width}mm`, width + 20 + offsetX, height / 2 + offsetY); ctx.fillText(`Height: ${height}mm`, width / 2 + offsetX, height + 30 + offsetY); let currentY = 10 + offsetY; for (const key in horizontalDistances) { const distance = horizontalDistances[key]; if (distance !== null) { currentY += distance; const isBeyondBounds = currentY > height + 10 + offsetY; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(10 + offsetX, currentY); ctx.lineTo(width + 10 + offsetX, currentY); ctx.strokeStyle = isBeyondBounds ? 'red' : 'black'; ctx.stroke(); const textWidth = ctx.measureText(`${distance}mm`).width; ctx.fillStyle = isBeyondBounds ? 'red' : 'black'; ctx.fillText(`${distance}mm`, width + Math.max(20, textWidth) + offsetX, currentY); } } let currentX = 10 + offsetX; for (const key in verticalDistances) { const distance = verticalDistances[key]; if (distance !== null) { currentX += distance; const isBeyondBounds = currentX > width + 10 + offsetX; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(currentX, 10 + offsetY); ctx.lineTo(currentX, height + 10 + offsetY); ctx.strokeStyle = isBeyondBounds ? 'red' : 'black'; ctx.stroke(); const textWidth = ctx.measureText(`${distance}mm`).width; ctx.fillStyle = isBeyondBounds ? 'red' : 'black'; ctx.fillText(`${distance}mm`, currentX - textWidth / 2, height + Math.max(30, textWidth) + offsetY); } } } }
